caption.center: STATE OF HAWAII, BY ITS ATTORNEY GENERAL, BERT T. KOBAYASHI v. MAURICE

opinion.panel: RICHARDSON, C.J., MARUMOTO, ABE, LEVINSON, JJ., AND CIRCUIT JUDGE WONG IN PLACE OF KOBAYASHI, J., DISQUALIFIED.
opinion.opinion_text: The petition for rehearing is denied without argument.
opinion.attorneys: Helen B. Ryan (Ryan Ryan of counsel), Molly D. Zimring and Franklin E. Zimring for the petition.Page 527
